title: Top 10 Mistakes Macbook Pro Owners Make
summary: Don’t run your Macbook Pro on the factory battery, not just those with Macbook Pros. You should always be aware of what you have running on your computer. Don't use a case with your laptop to protect it from being dropped or bumped without covering up the computer with a case. If you have too many apps running at once, it can really slow down the entire computer. It’s better to have a solid hard drive with plenty of storage on it if you do a lot of work with images or videos.

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:o,...e}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...e,components:o,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`Macbook Pros are fantastic laptops, but that doesn\u2019t mean they can\u2019t be improved. The Macbook Pro is a computer that has been iterated on for many years now. It is also a computer that has gained popularity for being the go-to laptop for video editors and other professionals who rely on the performance of their computer when it comes to editing video or images, like photographers. This article will go into detail about some of the most common mistakes Macbook Pro owners make with their machine and how you can avoid making these same mistakes yourself if you own one.
With so many different versions of the Macbook Pro available on the market right now, it\u2019s easy to get confused about which features you need as an owner of this device and which ones you don\u2019t. Here are some tips and tricks to keep in mind if you own a Macbook Pro:`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

content.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...o}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...o,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("h2",null,"Don\u2019t store your laptop in sleep mode"),mdx("p",null,`This one is a common mistake among all laptop owners, not just those with Macbook Pros. It\u2019s important to understand that when you store your laptop in sleep mode, it doesn\u2019t completely shut down like you might think. What\u2019s actually happening is that your laptop is saving the last state of what was on the screen at the time it entered sleep mode.
When you wake your computer back up from sleep mode, whatever was open when you last saved it will be reopened to where you left off. This is great if you were in the middle of working on a document and forgot to save it before you shut the computer down.
If you\u2019re planning on storing your Macbook for a long period of time without using it, it\u2019s best to shut the computer down instead of storing it in sleep mode.`),mdx("h2",null,"Don\u2019t run your Macbook Pro on the factory battery"),mdx("p",null,`This mistake is a little different from the others on this list because it doesn\u2019t really have anything to do with how you use the computer, it has to do with the type of battery you have inside your laptop. This mistake is commonly made by laptop owners who are looking for something more powerful than a standard battery.
When you buy a Macbook Pro, the battery that\u2019s included is actually a lithium-polymer battery. This type of battery is very different from the standard lithium-ion battery that most other laptops have. The standard kind of lithium-ion battery can be charged up to around 2,000 times while lithium-polymer batteries can only be charged up to 500 times before they need to be replaced.
If you have one of these higher capacity batteries, you should be aware that it will wear down faster than a standard battery. It is recommended that you purchase a replacement battery after about 500 charges, which is about two years of normal use.`),mdx("h2",null,"Don\u2019t have too many things running at once"),mdx("p",null,`This one is more of a general computer tip than one that is specific to Macbook Pro owners. Whenever you have too many apps running at once, it can really slow down the entire computer. Even if you have a powerful computer, if it\u2019s overwhelmed with what it has to be doing, it will start to run slower.
You should always be aware of what you have running on your computer. This includes programs that you have open as well as apps that are constantly running in the background.
Don\u2019t be afraid to close out of programs that you aren\u2019t using to free up some processing power. You can also try going into the Activity Monitor to see which apps are using up the most resources so that you can close them out to free things up a bit.`),mdx("h2",null,"Don\u2019t use a case with your Macbook Pro"),mdx("p",null,`This one is another one that you\u2019ll want to be careful with if you find yourself a Macbook Pro owner. It\u2019s common for people to put a case on their laptop to protect it from scratches and dents. While you definitely shouldn\u2019t throw your computer around, you shouldn\u2019t put a case on it either.
A case can hinder your computer from getting the airflow that it needs to stay cool while you\u2019re using it. On top of that, it can trap heat inside the computer and build up inside.
Without proper ventilation, your computer will overheat which can cause damage to to the internal components.
If you\u2019re someone who travels with your laptop often, it\u2019s best to invest in a durable case that will protect it from being dropped or bumped without covering up the computer with a case.`),mdx("h2",null,"Don\u2019t use cloud storage for processing intensive work with video and photos"),mdx("p",null,`This mistake is only really relevant if you\u2019re an avid photographer or someone who edits a lot of pictures and video. If you find yourself doing a lot of image and video editing via your computer, there\u2019s a good chance that you\u2019ll be uploading and downloading files from cloud storage.
Don\u2019t store these files in a cloud storage account. If you\u2019re doing any kind of processing on these files, the cloud storage will slow down and even stop the flow of data to your computer.
The computers and servers used to host cloud storage accounts are shared amongst many people and the more data that is stored on these servers, the slower everything will go.
It\u2019s better to have a solid hard drive with plenty of storage on it if you do a lot of work with images or videos. This will ensure that the computer\u2019s processor can move as quickly as possible while you\u2019re working.`),mdx("h2",null,"Do buy a quality mouse to go along with your Macbook Pro"),mdx("p",null,`If you\u2019re a person who does a lot of work on the computer, it\u2019s always a good idea to have a reliable mouse to go along with it.
Do not use the trackpad as a mouse. Doing so will cause you to press down on the trackpad with a lot more force than you need to which can lead to serious hand pain.
Don\u2019t let the fact that you\u2019re using a Macbook Pro stop you from buying a high-quality mouse. There are plenty of great options out there that will work well with your computer.`),mdx("h2",null,"Don\u2019t use earbuds or headphones that aren\u2019t high quality"),mdx("p",null,`If you\u2019re someone who likes to listen to music on your computer while you work or edit, you should make sure that you have a solid pair of headphones or earbuds that you use while you work.
Do not use the speakers in your computer to listen to music while you work. This is a surefire way to build up a lot of unnecessary noise in your life and work environment.`),mdx("h2",null,"Do get a solid, reliable USB-C cable for charging and file transfers"),mdx("p",null,`If you\u2019re buying a brand new Macbook Pro, you\u2019ll notice that it comes with a USB-C cable. These cables are incredibly useful for charging your computer as well as transferring data from one device to another.
Despite how useful these cables are, they are also some of the most commonly used items when it comes to computer repair. If you experience any issues with your computer, there\u2019s a good chance that the problem will be solved by replacing the cable.`),mdx("p",null,"A good cable can last for years, but a bad one can damage your computer in just a few months. To make sure you get a reliable cable, you should check out reviews before making a purchase. And remember to unplug the cable when you\u2019re not using it to reduce the risk of damage."))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: A Brief History of Apple - The Company behind Your Favorite Gadgets
Why Apple Inc Is a Good Long-Term Investment

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...o}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...o,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`The company has had its ups and downs in recent years. However, Apple Inc remains one of the most successful companies worldwide. In the last few years, particularly after 2013, Apple has lost some of its luster. Investors began to worry about the future of Apple as iPhone sales started falling year over year. The stock price tumbled from a high above $135 per share in September 2014 to just above $90 per share by June 2016.
But this is how investing works \u2014 when an investment falls too much and it becomes cheap relative to its intrinsic value, it\u2019s time to buy more shares! Consider this your ultimate guide on why Apple Inc is a good long-term investment. Keep reading to find out why you should consider buying more shares even though the stock price has fallen so much over such a short period of time.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: Tips for Buying the Best Macbook Pro

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:o,...e}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...e,components:o,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`The MacBook Pro is one of the most popular laptops on the market, and they\u2019re great machines. But with so many different versions to choose from, it can be difficult to know which one is right for you. Do you need a Touch Bar or not? What screen size do you need? How much storage space do you need? These are all questions you need to ask yourself before buying a Macbook Pro.
If you\u2019re thinking about buying a Macbook Pro, here are some helpful tips to make sure you get the best model for your needs. The Macbook Pro comes in 13-inch, 15-inch and 17-inch screens, so that\u2019s the first thing to consider when buying one. You also want to decide whether you need an integrated GPU (not all models have them) and how much storage space you want.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: The Ten Best Smartphones on the Market Today

intro.compiledSource: const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,"Smartphones are a big part of our lives. They help us stay in touch with friends, family and colleagues; they give us access to the internet wherever we go; and they even let us take photos and videos of things that would otherwise be forgotten forever. Smartphones are everywhere these days, which makes choosing one a little challenging. There are so many different brands, operating systems, features, languages, etc. that it can all be quite overwhelming. Thankfully, there are plenty of great options out there today no matter your specific needs and preferences. If you\u2019re looking for the best smartphone on the market today, this article is for you. In it we list some of the most popular devices available as well as some up-and-coming models worth keeping an eye on. Let\u2019s take a look at our top ten picks for the best smartphones on the market today"))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: Big Tech Companies and the Future of the Internet

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`The internet is rapidly growing larger and more complex. As of June 2018, there are approximately 3.4 billion users globally, with that number continuing to grow by the day. With so many different people using the internet, it\u2019s no surprise that big tech companies have begun to thrive once again.
At its core, the internet is an exchange of information between computers. In practice, this means a website like Google can store all of its user-friendly information online and anyone who wants to access it simply needs to type in a URL or visit a site directly. However, as more people use the internet and begin interacting with various programs and applications on websites, things become slightly more complicated.
As you probably know if you browse social media sites or read news articles online frequently, there are now several different \u201Clanguages\u201D being used on websites to make them more interactive. These programming languages are known as HTML5, CSS3, JS/JavaScript, and JSON \u2013 all acronyms that stand for something but might not mean much to most users at first glance.
However, these languages make up what is known as web content management systems (WCMS). A WCMS is essentially software that allows developers to create websites of any kind without having to code each page from scratch every time they want to launch a new one.
Here\u2019s a brief breakdown of what big tech companies and the future of the internet look like today:`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: 5 Reasons Why You Need a Macbook Pro

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:o,...e}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...e,components:o,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`MacBooks are the best laptops in the world. They\u2019re light, compact, and durable. You can use your MacBook for work, school, or play. You can also pair it with an Apple monitor for a dual-monitor setup. However, there is a downside to MacBooks: they\u2019re not as powerful as Macbook Pros.
If you want to get more from your laptop \u2014 especially if you plan on using it for intensive tasks such as photo editing or video editing \u2014 you need a Macbook Pro. The difference between the two models isn\u2019t large enough to be noticeable unless you really dig into their specs. The Macbook is better suited for casual users because of its lower price tag and reduced weight. But if you\u2019re considering buying a new laptop anytime soon, read these 5 reasons why You Need A Macbook Pro instead of the standard one.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: Google's Monopoly: How the Tech Giant Controls Our Lives
The Importance of Artificial Intelligence in Marketing: Should You Be Doing It?
The Future of AI: How AI Will Shape Our World in the Next Ten Years

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...o}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...o,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`Millennials are now the largest generation of workers in the U.S., and as they advance their careers, they\u2019ll continue to reshape how and where we work. The digital age has made it possible for people to work from virtually anywhere at any time. As a result, more people are leaving the office behind and working remotely or taking up independent contracting gigs, which is why we\u2019re seeing so many young professionals ditch cubicles for coffee shops and other remote-friendly offices.
Working from home, going independent, or collaborating with coworkers online means millennials have given rise to what some have called \u201Cthe gig economy.\u201D It\u2019s also prompted a shift in the types of companies people choose to work for and what skills they need to get hired in those roles \u2014 regardless of where they do that work. If you\u2019re looking to join this world of work in 2020, here\u2019s everything you need to know:`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;
